title: Back in the Game: A Gino Peterson Novel
description:
Gino Peterson (They Always Win) wants 
Back in the Game
 as a trooper working for the RI State Police Intelligence Unit, investigating organized crime. So does one of his acquaintances from the old neighborhood, Richard "Moon" Capelli, albeit on the other side of the law. Their paths are set on a collision course in this gritty and authentic study of the motivation to belong - and how far some people might go to be somebody again.
author: Anthony M Pesare
